verses.verse: A Psalm of praise. Shout triumphantly for the Lord, all ye of the land.
Serve the Lord with gladness. Come before him with the shout of joy.
Know that the Lord is very God: he made us and not we ourselves: we are his people and the sheep of his pasture.
O enter his gates with thanksgiving; his courts with songs of praise: give thanks to him and praise his name:
for the Lord is good; his mercy endureth forever; and his truth to all generations.
